column5: Man am i happy I am not him... why he wasnt harnessed is way beyond me but .... http://www.fieldandstream.com/fieldstream/...32302_1,00.html  Ohh btw look at the other vids they are hilarious....
Oh man....if they still landed the fish, that guy deserves a medal!!!!
Man did that guy get hoofed in the face.That is an ALi boxing deer.I wonder if this guy went to the Hospital.  MH

there was a guy a few years ago from the Virginia beach area thta used to go to the Bahammas and work the guide boats for Marlin.He went to land a small one and wrapped the leader around his wrist to pull in the fish.The fish was still a bit green and dove.It pulled him down about 20 ft and sat there for a few seconds.It then dove again and went out of site..Scary stuff..gives me the willies to think about it! Joe
Geeze no big deal, happens a lot while smallmouth fishing in our area every year!
bambi kicked that guys butt!  That fish pulling him in is crazy, wonder how he made out? to bad they didnt show more of the video
I know... I wanted to see what happened to the guy too... I still dont get why he wasn't harnessed to the boat... I guess thats just a lesson though...
Right so... guy, attached to rod, attached to line, attached to fish that weighs three times what the guy weighs...and nothing is attached to the boat?  Sounds fishy...  that there is a big fishy!
